sentences.en: According to the Guinness a Chihuahua, is the smallest dog in the world.
sentences.cn: 根据《金氏世界纪录大全》,布兰蒂这只吉娃娃狗, 是世界上最小的狗狗.

sentences.en: Also, I personally own a little Chihuahua and in my dream, he is also with me.
sentences.cn: 在我的梦中, 我私人还有座小州, 它也是属于我的.

sentences.en: How could a Chihuahua kill a Rottweiler?
sentences.cn: 吉娃娃怎么可能会要了罗特韦尔的命?

sentences.en: I have a lovely chihuahua, it comes from Mexico.
sentences.cn: 我有一只可爱的吉娃娃狗, 它来自墨西哥.

sentences.en: Major Cities: Mexico City, Guadalajara, Monterrey, Puebla , Ciudad Juarez , Leon, Tijuana, Acapulco de Juarez, Chihuahua.
sentences.cn: 主要城市: 墨西哥城 、 瓜达拉哈拉 、 蒙特雷 、 普埃布拉 、 华雷斯城、莱昂 、 蒂华纳 、 阿卡普尔科-德华雷斯 、 奇瓦瓦.

sentences.en: Shortly before their recent wedding they were arrested by the morality police while sitting in their car with their pet chihuahua.
sentences.cn: 这对新婚夫妇在结婚前不久曾被道德警察逮捕，当时他们正和他们的吉娃娃宠物狗一起坐在车里。

sentences.en: Well, I think my chihuahua just killed him...
sentences.cn: 哦，我想我的吉娃娃刚要了它的命……

trans.tran_en: A Chihuahua is a very small dog with short hair
